name: Shadow Souls (The Dude games)
description:
Help the little shadow to reach the top of the abyss and recover the soul.
Open your way jumping to platforms and use the walls to bounce and change your direction.

If you like a hard challenge, here you have two of them:
Complete every level of the game and take all the coins as and extra challenge.

A simple one touch game that  will entertain you for hours!
